entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 12:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
